snippet: Russia’s foreign ministry lashed out on Friday over the sentencing of a Russian arms trafficker, Viktor Bout, to 25 years in prison, warning that it could harm relations with Washington.
abstract: Russia lashes out at the United States over sentencing of convicted Russian arms trafficker Viktor Bout to 25 years in prison; Russian officials describe the case as a conspiracy that involves government collusion with the courts, American media and even Hollywood.
lead_paragraph: Russia’s foreign ministry lashed out on Friday over the sentencing of a Russian arms trafficker, Viktor Bout, to 25 years in prison, warning that it could harm relations with Washington.

headline.seo: Russia Says Sentencing of Viktor Bout Hurts Ties With U.S.
headline.main: Russia Denounces U.S. Sentencing of Arms Dealer
headline.print_headline: Russia Says Case Strains Ties to U.S.
